input_data.title: Not Dead Yet
input_data.overview: Nell Serrano is a broke and newly single self-described disaster. She works to restart the life and career she left behind some 10 years ago. When writing obituaries is the only job she can find, Nell starts getting life advice from an unlikely (and dead) source.

response.analytical_summary: Not Dead Yet is a comedic series centered on Nell Serrano, a woman attempting to rebuild her life and career after a personal setback. The show blends workplace comedy with a supernatural element, as Nell receives guidance from a deceased colleague. It explores themes of second chances, self-discovery, and finding purpose, all while maintaining a lighthearted and quirky tone. The series offers a feel-good experience with a touch of the absurd, appealing to audiences seeking a humorous and uplifting narrative.
response.spoiler_rich_plot_summary: The series begins with Nell, recently divorced and struggling financially, accepting a job writing obituaries for a local newspaper. Desperate for a fresh start, she finds herself unexpectedly guided by the ghost of the previous obituary writer, a cynical and eccentric man who died under mysterious circumstances. Initially resistant to the spectral advice, Nell gradually learns to embrace the unconventional wisdom, which often clashes with her own attempts at conventional success. As Nell navigates the challenges of her new job and personal life, she uncovers secrets about her predecessor's death and the newspaper's history, leading her on a journey of self-discovery and unexpected connections. The series follows Nell's attempts to balance her professional ambitions with the bizarre reality of her ghostly mentor, all while confronting her own past mistakes and embracing a new sense of purpose.
response.keyword_sentence: Not Dead Yet is a lighthearted comedy series about a woman finding second chances and unexpected guidance from a ghostly mentor while navigating the quirky world of a local newspaper.
